Class MoveDirection

java.lang.Object
com.ingame.PassDestination
com.ingame.GameMovement
com.ingame.MoveDirection
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameStatus
public class MoveDirection extends GameMovement
Handles cells movements based on direction for all cells on the game board.
Since:
2022-11-01
Version:
2022-12-03
Author:
Lisa Ho Yen Xin
